turns.content: Are any of those completely free (free trial or freemium does not count)

Yes, some of the resources I mentioned do offer completely free access to their Chinese news articles. Here are a few examples:

1. ChineseNewsNet: This website provides a selection of news articles at different HSK levels for free, along with vocabulary lists and grammar explanations.
2. MandarinSpot: This website provides a selection of news articles and videos at different HSK levels for free, along with vocabulary lists and interactive exercises.
3. ChineseReadingPractice: This website provides a selection of news articles at different HS
